descriptionSection.title: Description of the Property
descriptionSection.text: Located only 23 km from the center of Warsaw, this property provides the perfect balance of a peaceful retreat amidst nature reserves and farmland, while still being in close proximity to all the conveniences of a bustling metropolis.

rooms.title: Foyer and Central Corridor
rooms.text: Upon entering the home, guests are greeted by a welcoming foyer accentuated by graceful pocket doors that lead to an expansive corridor which connects the ground floor living spaces with the central staircase that bridges the transition between the communal areas below and the private sanctuaries above.

rooms.title: The Great Room
rooms.text: The great room features reclaimed wooden beams and flooring, dating back 120 years, and a two-story natural stone fireplace. Fitted with state-of-the-art ventilation and a retractable glass panel, the fireplace ensures warmth, style, and versatility.

rooms.title: Vaulted Ceiling with Gallery
rooms.text: The vaulted ceiling creates a spacious and airy atmosphere in the great room, while the upper gallery offers an ideal spot for relaxation or reading and an excellent vantage point for viewing the room’s impressive architecture.

rooms.title: Kitchen
rooms.text: The kitchen space has been intentionally left unfinished, offering new homeowners the unique opportunity to tailor it according to their tastes and preferences. To provide a glimpse of its potential,  we have included a rendering that envisions the kitchen in a classic white and black color scheme.

rooms.title: Veranda
rooms.text: The 38 m² veranda offers a unique ambiance and opportunity to entertain guests and relish in the fresh air of the secluded rear garden.

rooms.title: Upper Level
rooms.text: The upper level of the home includes four bedrooms, including the Master Suite, which are connected by a bright hallway with a shared bathroom at one end and the great room's upper gallery at the other end. The bathroom has been left unfinished, but renderings showcase potential design ideas, including additional laundry facilities.

rooms.title: Master Suite
rooms.text: A luxurious master suite includes an en-suite bath and French doors that open onto a 38 m2 terrace. Renderings for the yet-to-be-completed master bathroom provide a potential design concept.

rooms.title: Upper Balcony
rooms.text: An upper 9 m2 balcony above the main entrance of the house adds an element of luxury to the south-facing bedroom, allowing occupants to take in the captivating views of the orchard and surrounding areas.

rooms.title: Full Basement
rooms.text: The spacious basement is a versatile and functional space for a variety of purposes, such as recreational activities, home theater, gym, and playroom for children.  The natural and electric lighting work together to provide a well-lit space which could also be used as a workshop.

rooms.title: Garage & Studio Apartment
rooms.text: A self-contained living space with kitchen, bath and separate entrance is located above the attached two-stall heated garage, a perfect solution for live-in help or family members who need their own space.

rooms.title: Hand-crafted Wood-shingled Roof
rooms.text: The wood-shingled roof that’s shaped and fitted around eyebrow dormers is a distinctive architectural feature that’s been used for centuries in Poland. Known as “gant,” the roof has a lifespan of around 40 to 50 years or even longer when properly maintained.

rooms.title: Garden
rooms.text: Situated on a partially wooded plot of 3800 m2, the thoughtfully landscaped garden combines mature  trees and seasonal flowers that bloom from early spring through late fall, perfect for relaxing or organizing large parties.

installations.text: Entry management and smart alarm systems, equipped with high-resolution cameras, sensors and wi-fi connectivity allow homeowners to see and communicate with visitors in real-time from the central panel or their smartphones.
Automated irrigation system is fed by a deep well and an underground tank is also available for the catchment of rainwater.
Bi-functional floor and radiant heating system - Viessman gas boiler installed in 2018.
Sweeping stone driveway edged with reclaimed granite paving stones, and an outdoor lighting system create a welcoming atmosphere and ample parking for guests.

media.text: Gas, water and sewage from the municipal network.
Fiberoptic internet from Mazowieckie Sieci Światłowodowe.

artisansSection.title: Meet the Artisans & Tradesmen
artisansSection.text: The attention to detail and quality of workmanship exhibited by the artisans and tradesmen who built the house is a testament to their expertise and dedication to their craft.

natureSection.title: A perfect place to commune with nature
natureSection.text: The property offers a rare opportunity to immerse oneself in nature in its purest form, with hectares of rolling fields, lush woodlands, and serene ponds – all within a short walk from the house.

nearbyPoints.title: Villa La Fleur Museum
nearbyPoints.text: The museum features a splendid private collection of the works of Polish and Jewish artists associated with the École de Paris as well as temporary exhibitions

nearbyPoints.title: Stara Papiernia Shopping Center
nearbyPoints.text: A beautiful, modern shopping center situated in a renovated 19th century paper mill with a shopping street characteristic of small towns where cultural events, concerts and shows are organized.

nearbyPoints.title: Konstancin Farmers Market
nearbyPoints.text: On Wednesdays and Saturdays, the area across from Stara Papiernia on al. Wojska Polskiego, turns into a bustling and colorful market square for a few hours. Local producers of poultry, meats, cheeses and fruits & vegetables offer a wide variety of food and handcrafted products.

nearbyPoints.title: Stefan Żeromski Museum
nearbyPoints.text: The former home of Stefan Zeromski (1864-1925), a well-known Polish writer, offers free guided tours which can be arranged at a specific time.

nearbyPoints.title: Count Witold Skórzewski Spa Park
nearbyPoints.text: Nestled in the center of Konstancin-Jeziorna, the therapeutic saline water graduation tower and the Hugonowka natural medicine clinic is a popular attraction for locals, tourists and convalescents.

nearbyPoints.title: American School of Warsaw
nearbyPoints.text: ASW is an English-using international school for children aged 3 to 18-years-of-age in elementary school, middle school, and high school, including an International Baccalaureate program.

nearbyPoints.title: Kabaty Forest Nature Preserve
nearbyPoints.text: The largest nature preserve in the Mazowieckie Voivodeship

nearbyPoints.title: Wake Park Konstancin
nearbyPoints.text: Wake Park is a water sports & leisure center with 2 wakeboard lifts, a stand-up paddle center, 5 beach volleyball pitches, 2 water playgrounds, footbag and Badminton courts with a beach bar and restaurant for chilling.

nearbyPoints.title: Botanical Gardens in Powsin
nearbyPoints.text: Operated by the Polish Academy of Sciences, the Gardens offer a wide array of year-round educational programs, exhibitions and events.

nearbyPoints.title: Wisła River & Ferry
nearbyPoints.text: Only 4.4 km from the property, the Wisła river offers a variety of opportunities for recreation, including fishing, biking, and boating.  You can also cross the river to the other side by car, bike or on foot by taking a ride on the Gassy-Karczew Ferry.

nearbyPoints.title: Chojnów Landscape Park
nearbyPoints.text: Covering an area of 68 square kilometers of the Chojnów Forest, the park has 11 nature reserves and is popular for hiking, cycling and horseback-riding.

nearbyPoints.title: Mistrzowie Imprez
nearbyPoints.text: Mistrzowie Imprez offers an array of fun activities for both young and old with an impressive array of equipment, including Monster Trucks, Aero tunnel, Jump Chute, 360⁰ Swing, Twisted Buggy and more.
